attributes.action: Voting age to be 16 instead of 18
attributes.additional_details: From my own point of view there has been times I have wished to vote of something but my age holds me back. I can make a valid and sensible decision on my future as from the age of 16 I was caring fro myself and at 17 I was in my own flat, due to this o see no reason why 16 and 17 year olds should be able to vote as well with the correct Education first.
attributes.background:
Many younger people want to and should have a say in their future! 
Many 16 and 17 year olds should have the right to vote as we are eligible to start working meaning we should have a say how things are done in our country and let our voices be heard As it’s our future on the line.
